title: How to Set Boundaries in a Relationship
description:
“Gabby, we want MORE!” After my first Dear Gabby episode on how to set boundaries in a relationship, listeners begged me to keep the conversation going. So in today’s podcast, I’m cutting right to the chase and sharing the one thing you MUST do to create a clear boundary with love. This practice will also help you feel deep compassion for yourself … and live a more heart-centered life.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 
For more guidance on setting boundaries with love, check out this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast. https://bit.ly/3AzwUQH  
 
If you enjoyed this show and you want to learn more about your patterns and needs in relationships, this is my assignment for you: Take my free, 2-minute What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz. You'll get to know a lot more about yourself in minutes … and that will help you take your boundary work to the next level! https://bit.ly/3Azqr8h

Want to uplevel your relationships and ALL areas of your life? I can be your spiritual coach all year long inside the Miracle Membership! It’s time to start living a life beyond your wildest dreams—join the Miracle Membership today! https://bit.ly/3AyOYu0

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. 

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Just Thrive Probiotic and Just Calm make the perfect 1-2 punch to beat stress before it beats you… No fake marketing, no claims, just real, scientifically proven results to help you be the best you. And right now, you can get 15% off this dynamic duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout.

 

Perfect Bar knows it will be love at first bite, so for a limited time, they’re offering you a chance to try their Refrigerated Protein Bars for FREE. All you have to do is go to perfectsnacks.com/gabby to get a FREE Perfect Bar today.

 

Produced by Dear Media.
